page.title: 17YOUTH
page.content: Youth (2). The following comments show the feelings of many local teenagers. "I like it here because I've got more friends and it's quiet." "I like living here because I've lived in a busy area for most of my life and I enjoy the peace and quiet." "I like it here. There's not a lot to do but we play in the street and nup the cricket field." "I like it. There's quite a lot to do. I help the farmers, go fishing and walking. I go to the youth club in the winter." "I hope that the village will stay as it is and no more houses will be built."
